thread.title: Turkish Lira May Need More Central Bank Help
thread.title_full: Turkish Lira May Need More Central Bank Help - WSJ

author: Richard Barley
title: Turkish Lira May Need More Central Bank Help
text:
Watch out below: The slide in the Turkish lira shows few signs of stopping.
The lira Tuesday hit a record low of 2.90 against the dollar; the greenback has risen 24% against the Turkish currency this year. The latest move came as the Turkish central bank left rates unchanged and unveiled plans for simplifying a complex monetary policy system that supplies liquidity to banks at multiple rates via multiple instruments.
